title: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details
description: Bug 9619: Move static member: Dialog details 20020212a. Mnemonicsb. No validation on the type field. Type existence is not too expensive (done in the type wizard for super class), so it could be done. At least isValidTypeNamef. The label could say 'Select destination type:'g.
OB: The selection dialog is not initialized with the type currently entered in the 'Move static field(s)' operation.
EB: The title should be updated to 'Move static field(s)' and the description should be updated to 'Move x fields from xx'd. Additionally, the selection dialog should be initialized with the type currently entered.
SR: To reproduce the issue, browse and select a type from a CU in a different project.
